org.restlet.engine.log

Class SimplestFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • org.restlet.engine.log.SimplestFormatter

  • public class SimplestFormatter
extends Formatter
    Special log formatter that displays the actual message only. It also displays the stack trace if available. This is particularly useful for debugging.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel
